item.description:
Cape Ann Whale Watch in Gloucester, MA

website: www.seethewhales.com

Pricing: $25 / The chapter will contribute $5 for members, so members pay only $20! Please note that a member is someone that has paid their membership dues to the organization ($30) and is a South Windsor Jaycee. Just being a member on meetup does not qualify for the "Jaycee member" discount.

Normal price is $40 per person. Children are $17. Please bring cash or a check with you on the day of.

Carpooling: Meet at commuter lot in Manchester by John Harvards Brew House at 7:00am.

Feel free to bring friends and family. Remember to bring warm clothing, as it gets chilly on the water!

RSVP to Caroline at wintercl@gmail.com.
item.how_to_find_us: look for a gathering of cars with people
item.name: Cape Ann Whale Watch
